name: Shoot D Evil
description:
A side scrolling shooting game with your most hated and evil people....

FEATURES - 
  • Request to add a Evil
  • Smooooooooth Animations
  • You get to kill Evil people
  • All assets were made in PAINT lmao
  • GO NUCLEAR!
  • some SFX made with table and mouth sounds.
  • Available for Windows and Mac and Linux
  • WEB SUPPORT!
CONTROLS -

Mouse to move the crosshair and aim

Left Click to kill

N to go Nuclear after your Nuclear Bar is full

CREDITS - 

Music by Twin Musicom - Mega Rust ,  Odd News

Font  by W Fonts.

Procedural Generation  Tutorial here.

How to request a custom Evil -

Go to this form fill it out and attach a reference image.
Here
